verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana kama wewe
ungehesabu maovu
Bwana ni nani
angesimama.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lakini kwako kuna
msamaha,
ili wewe uogopwe,
uogopwe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nimemngoja Bwana
Roho yangu,
na neno lake
nimelitumaini.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kama walinzi waingojavyo
walinzi waingojavyo
asubuhi.
